snippet.title: Hawthorn: Gameplay Trailer Announcement
snippet.description:
Former developers from Bethesda, BioWare, and Naughty Dog bring you Hawthorn, a sandbox RPG realm of anthropomorphic animals and fairy creatures. Play co-op or solo as you build a village of memorable NPCs, farm, craft, explore, and celebrate the seasons in an ever-changing world bigger than you.

Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3078150/Hawthorn/?utm_source=social&utm_term=youtube

Visit the Official Hawthorn website:
www.PlayHawthorn.com

Join our Discord community for development updates:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3078150/Hawthorn/

#playhawthorn #announcement #videogames #indiegames #coop  #rpggames #sandboxgames  #cozygames
